channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Become a Microsoft Defender Vulnerability Management Ninja
item.description:
Do you want to become a ninja for Microsoft Defender Vulnerability Management? We can help you get there! We collected content with multiple modules. We will keep updating this training on a regular basis.
In addition, we offer you a knowledge check based on the training material! Since there’s a lot of content, the goal of the knowledge checks is to help ensure understanding of the key concepts that were covered. Lastly, there’ll be a fun certificate issued at the end of the training: Disclaimer: This is not an official Microsoft certification and only acts as a way of recognizing your par...
